contains.display: How often in the past 12 months would you say the patient was worried or stressed about having enough money to buy nutritious meals [BRFSS]
Hunger Vital Sign [HVS]
Within the past 12 months we worried whether our food would run out before we got money to buy more [U.S. FSS]
Within the past 12 months the food we bought just didn't last and we didn't have money to get more [U.S. FSS]
Food insecurity risk [HVS]
